title: IBM security advisory (AV25-281)
description: Between May 12 and 18, 2025, IBM published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were critical updates for the following products:
products: IBM Business Automation Workflow Enterprise Service Bus  multiple versions
IBM Business Automation Workflow traditional  multiple versions
IBM Storage Copy Data Management  version 2.2.0.0 to 2.2.25.0
IBM watsonx Assistant for IBM Cloud Pak for Data  version 4.0.0 to 4.8.7
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
